doc.field: Thomas N. Schroth and Raymond A. Schroth, S.J. Brooklyn Eagle collection
Thomas N. Schroth and Raymond A. Schroth, S.J. Brooklyn Eagle collection
Series 2: Raymond A. Schroth, S.J. Eagle and Brooklyn papers
Series 2: Raymond A. Schroth, S.J. Eagle and Brooklyn papers

This series is located in Record Carton 2 and is largely comprised of manuscript and typescript notes written by Raymond Schroth during the preparation of his Ph.D. dissertation at George Washington University, later edited and made into a book with the title The Eagle and Brooklyn. Other materials in these papers include clippings, correspondence, and some college papers.
